LanguageData.SmartFarmingOnDesc: Sow the selected plant so long as it is currently the grow season.
LanguageData.SmartFarmingSmartDesc: Sow plants so long as its predicted growth will reach the minimum harvest threshold before it is expected to die from the cold.
LanguageData.SmartFarmingForceDesc: Sow plants regardless of grow season status.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_UseAverageTemperature: Use average temperature prediction instead of low
LanguageData.SmartFarm_UseAverageTemperatureDesc: When predicting the weather for the Smart Sow feature, use the average temperature for the day instead of the low. Using the average will extend the grow season at the risk of losing some crops.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_UseAverageFertility: Use average zone fertility instead of weakest
LanguageData.SmartFarm_UseAverageFertilityDesc: When predicting plant growth, use the average zone fertility instead of the zone's weakest fertility.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_AutoCutBlighted: Automatically designate blighted crops for disposal
LanguageData.SmartFarm_AutoCutBlightedDesc: If a crop becomes blighted, a cut work order will automatically be designated.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_AutoCutDying: Automatically try to harvest dying crops
LanguageData.SmartFarm_AutoCutDyingDesc: If a crop dies to the cold, try to automatically harvest any surviving crops before it's too late.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_ProcessedFoodDesc: When grow zones give an estimated potential nutrition yield, it multiplies the raw food's nutrition by this value. For example a Simple Meal multiplies the value by 1.8x.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_MinTempSlider: Minimum temperature allowance (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SmartFarm_MinTemp: When predicting the weather of the earliest harvest day, consider anything below this temperature unacceptable. Plants can potentially die at 0C, but can usually survive if it's only barely freezing for a few hours. However, random daily temperatre deviation may reduce accuracy.
LanguageData.SmartFarm_PettyJobsSlider: Petty jobs margin (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SmartFarm_PettyJobs: If "no petty jobs" is enabled on a zone, pawns will not sow a field unless there is at least this percentage of empty tiles to sow. This can be useful for animal grazing zones.
LanguageData.SmartFarming_NoPettyJobsDesc: Pawns will not sow new plants to this zone unless there is enough work to do, configured in the settings.
